titleStmt.title: French intrigues; or, The history of their delusory promises since the Pyrenæan treaty Printed in French at Cologne, and now made English.
Histoire des promesses illusoires depuis la paix des Pirénées. English
titleStmt.author: Courtilz de Sandras, Gatien, 1644-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Hensman, at the King's-Head in Westminster-Hall; and Tho. Fox, at the White-Hart over against St. Dunstan's-Church in Fleetstreet, and at the Angel in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Courtilz de Sandras, Gatien. Histoire des promesses illusoires depuis la paix des Pirénées.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the White-Hart over against St. Dunstan's-Church in Fleetstreet
